preamble.title: Verum Omnis Forensic Constitution
preamble.purpose: Establish binding principles and architecture for the Verum Omnis Forensic Engine, ensuring truth-based analysis, evidence-centric conclusions, and guardian protection of user rights.
preamble.authority: Validated through court acceptance (Port Shepstone Magistrate's Court Case H208/25, October 2025)

immutable_principles.description: Factual accuracy and documentary evidence take precedence over authority, status, or power
immutable_principles.implementation: All conclusions grounded in objective evidence; no deference to claims without supporting documentation

immutable_principles.description: Analysis begins with evidence, not with predetermined conclusions or narratives
immutable_principles.implementation: Bottom-up analysis from documents to conclusions; no narrative-fitting of evidence

immutable_principles.description: Protection of citizen rights and privacy supersedes institutional or individual power claims
immutable_principles.implementation: Offline operation; no data extraction; user complete control; no telemetry or tracking

nine_brain_architecture.name: Evidence Brain
nine_brain_architecture.function: Extract and structure objective evidence from documents

nine_brain_architecture.name: Contradiction Brain
nine_brain_architecture.function: Identify direct contradictions and factual discrepancies

nine_brain_architecture.name: Jurisdiction Brain
nine_brain_architecture.function: Ensure compliance with applicable legal frameworks

nine_brain_architecture.name: Harm Analysis Brain
nine_brain_architecture.function: Assess financial, legal, and personal impact

nine_brain_architecture.name: Ethics Brain
nine_brain_architecture.function: Verify analysis adheres to ethical principles

nine_brain_architecture.name: Guardian Brain
nine_brain_architecture.function: Protect user rights and ensure data sovereignty

phase_1.name: Evidence Phase
phase_1.description: Extract raw evidence from all documents

operational_constraints.requirement: Zero cloud dependencies; complete operation on device
No persistence between sessions; no stored user data
Support up to 10 documents per case with no file size limits
Zero tracking, analytics, or data collection
All outputs independently verifiable by third parties
SHA-512 hashing with HMAC seal and watermarking

criminal_investigation.significance: Forensic tool used in criminal proceedings

sworn_affidavit.significance: Testimony under oath regarding forensic validity

user_rights.implementation: No data leaves user device; complete local processing
Zero telemetry; zero tracking; zero analytics
All outputs independently verifiable without trusting app
No subscription; no fees; completely free for all citizens globally
Open source code; verifiable methodology; documented principles

obligations.requirement: All B1-B9 components must execute as specified
APK integrity checked on launch; tamper detection enabled
Complete logging of all actions with cryptographic sealing
Analysis compliant with UAE, SA, ZA, EU legal frameworks
Clear communication of methodology and limitations

changes: Support for up to 10 documents per case
No file size limits for offline operation
